snippet: Shares of the the insurer the Chubb Corporation soared after the company agreed to be acquired by Ace.
abstract: Stocks rise on news that deal might be reached between Greece and its creditors.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the the insurer the Chubb Corporation soared after the company agreed to be acquired by Ace.

headline.main: Stocks End Higher, Reflecting Hope for a Greek Resolution
headline.print_headline: Prospects for Resolution on Greece Raise Investors’ Hopes
